titles.title: A resolution designating the week beginning May 11, 2008, as "National Nursing Home Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
4/30/2008--Introduced.
Designates the week beginning May 11, 2008, as National Nursing Home Week. Recognizes that a majority of people in the United States will require long-term care services at some point.
Honors nursing home residents and the people who care for them each day.
